channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Mecha Break’ Has Lost 60% Of Its Players In A Week, User Scores Sink
item.description: Despite initial positive impressions from early tests, the launch of Mecha Break itself does not seem to be going terribly well just a short while aft...

item.title: New Google Gmail Upgrade For 2 Billion Users — Email Just Got Safer
item.description: Google has just made Gmail easier and more secure to manage for 2 billion users — here’s what you need to know.

item.title: Will Integrating AI Into Web Browsers Replace Search Engines?

item.title: Walgreens Shareholders Approve $10 Billion Private Equity Buyout
item.description: Walgreens shareholders Friday approved private equity firm Sycamore Partners’ $10 billion buyout offer for the iconic drugstore chain.

item.title: New Materials And Design Made With Other Species In Mind

item.title: Publicity or public relations?

item.title: The future doesn’t care
item.description: It doesn’t care whether you’re excited or filled with trepidation. It arrives, regardless. What an opportunity. Or a threat. Up to us.
